title: Bolt ION XRT 1311
description:
Clean with power. Clean for longer.

A powerful clean is now available in a lightweight, cordless vacuum. The BOLT™ ION XRT 2-in-1 Lightweight Cordless Vacuum is an easy-to-use cordless vacuum with a removable hand vacuum. With the powerful 25.2V Li-Ion battery, you get up to 40 minutes of run time, so you can clean little messes or full rooms. Remove the hand vacuum for quick cleanup and above-floor surfaces. EdgeReach™ Technology delivers powerful suction to the edges of the vacuum foot to capture dirt and debris even from corners. The included crevice tool with dusting brush helps clean hard-to-reach areas. It’s the power you need in a compact design. 

    A lightweight cordless stick vacuum with a 2-way folding handle and removable hand vacuum to easily clean wherever dirt is
    Includes 25.2V Li-Ion battery, EdgeReach™ Technology, normal/boosted suction settings, and a charging base
    Up to 40 minutes of cordless power
    Edge bristles and brush roll on/off switch
    180º swivel steering
    2-year limited warranty

asset.author: BISSELL

http://www.bissell.com/bissell-bolt-ion-xrt-2-in-1-lightweight-cordless-vacuum-25.2V/

transcripts: You've worked hard to make your house a home. So to keep your home as clean as it can be, you want a vacuum designed to clear up degree quickly and effectively. The Bolt Ion XRT is designed to help you clean the day to day messes that may come your way. Bolt Ion XRT's 25.2 volt lithium-ion battery allows you to vacuum with continuous cordless power for up to 40 minutes. At the touch of a button, Bolt Ion XRT's edge technology focuses suction to the edge of the vacuum to clean all the way into edges and corners. Bolt Ion XRT's swivel steering design allows for easy cleaning around furniture and other obstacles. And the two way folding handle allows Bolt Ion XRT's powerful suction to clean in hard to reach spaces. The removable hand vacuum provides powerful suction and a handheld device allowing for quick spot cleans wherever necessary. all of these features are available in one unit that is ready to clean when ever you are, and most importantly, allows you to get back to enjoying your home. The Bolt Ion XRT from Bissell.
